name: Trail Edge Force Constraint
description: Make the force on a trail edge to reach a prescribed value.

inputParameters.name: edge_key
inputParameters.description: The key of a COMPAS CEM trail edge.

inputParameters.name: weight
inputParameters.description: The weight of the constraint in the optimization problem. Defaults to one.

outputParameters.name: constraint
outputParameters.description: A COMPAS CEM trail force constraint.
